hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Group group where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(code) || isNotBlank(remark)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(group.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(group.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(principalLeaderNames)> or lower(group.remark) like '%${principalLeaderNames?lower_case}%' </if> ) </if> order by code asc,name
